## FirebaseAppSettings interface

Configuration options given to [initializeApp()](./app.initializeapp.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FirebaseAppSettings 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [automaticDataCollectionEnabled?](./app.firebaseappsettings.automaticdatacollectionenabled.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> The settable config flag for GDPR opt-in/opt-out |
|  [name?](./app.firebaseappsettings.name.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> custom name for the Firebase App. The default value is <code>&quot;[DEFAULT]&quot;</code>. |
